title: Interview: Karamo Brown On 'Queer Eye' & 'Embracing Purpose'
description: Fab Fiver Karamo Brown takes Sam to church, so to speak, in this episode recorded in front of a live audience at Sixth & I in Washington, D.C. Sam and Karamo spoke about his new memoir, 'Karamo Brown: My Story of Embracing Purpose, Healing, and Hope.'

itunes:title: Interview: Karamo Brown On 'Queer Eye' & 'Embracing Purpose'
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Sam talks to the Fab Fiver about how he learned to heal himself before he could help others.
itunes:subtitle: Sam talks to the Fab Fiver about how he learned to heal himself before he could help others.
